creator: michi@apache.org
text:
I think we should do this for 1.2 because the end user experience will be much
better and there are quite some Windows users out there

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: not necessary for the release because there is the windows installer

This is often a pitfall for users as I experienced today.
Of course we have the .exe for windows, but hey this would fine if fixed for 1.2.
I schedule it for 1.2, because we should document all open issues for 1.2 in the
release note.
creator: roku@apache.org

text: trapo: i confirm this issue, the war file is ok when deployed in tomcat.
